mapper.select: select A.cart_id cartId,B.product_id productId,B.p_name name,A.count,B.p_title title,B.p_price price,C.thumbnail,A.created_at createdAt from order_basket A inner join product B on A.product_id=B.product_id inner join product_img C on B.product_id=C.product_id where A.iuser=#{iuser} group by B.product_id order by A.created_at desc
select p_price from product where product_id=#{productId}
select cart_id cartId from order_basket where iuser=#{iuser} and product_id=#{productId}
